subject: Genetics and Heredity
Women and Girls
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Times readers responded to an essay by Dr. Alice Dreger regarding the sex testing of the South African sprinter Caster Semenya, who won the women’s 800 at the world championships.
snippet: Times readers responded to an essay by Dr. Alice Dreger regarding the sex testing of the South African sprinter Caster Semenya, who won the women’s 800 at the world championships.
